title: Create 1Password skill with progressive disclosure
description: ⚠️ REQUIRES OPUS - architectural skill design. Build a 1Password skill following progressive disclosure architecture (see docs/skill-creation-guide.md). SKILL.md routes to workflows for listing, adding, migrating secrets. Includes migration workflows for .env files AND MCP configs. Scripts handle deterministic operations.

acceptanceCriteria.text: SKILL.md is <100 lines, routes to workflows based on user intent
Create workflows/list-secrets.md with op item list patterns and filtering
Create workflows/add-secret.md with op item create workflow
Create workflows/migrate-mcp.md for MCP config API keys → 1Password
Create workflows/troubleshoot.md for auth issues, biometric timeouts, token conflicts
Create scripts/migrate-env.sh that migrates .env with project/service nesting
Create scripts/scan-mcp-secrets.sh that finds API keys in MCP configs
All workflow files use imperative language (Run:, Verify:, If error:)
Description includes trigger keywords: 1password, secrets, op, vault, migrate, credentials, mcp
Test: /1password loads router, asks what user wants to do
Symlink skill to ralphtools/skills/1password/ for version control
